description: The metadata format for all federal open data. Validates a single JSON object entry (as opposed to entire Data.json catalog).
title: Project Open Data Dataset

___@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Dataset for each Dataset
___@type.title: Metadata Context

___license.description: The license dataset or API is published with. See Open Licenses for more information.
___license.title: License

___theme.description: Main thematic category of the dataset.
___theme.title: Category

___bureauCode.description: Federal agencies, combined agency and bureau code from OMB Circular A-11, Appendix C in the format of 015:010.
___bureauCode.title: Bureau Code

___accrualPeriodicity.description: Frequency with which dataset is published.
___accrualPeriodicity.title: Frequency

___title.description: Human-readable name of the asset. Should be in plain English and include sufficient detail to facilitate search and discovery.
___title.title: Title

$eref.description: A Dataset Publisher Organization as a foaf:Agent object
$eref.title: Project Open Data Organization

___name.description: A full formatted name, eg Firstname Lastname
___name.title: Publisher Name

___@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be org:Organization for each publisher
___@type.title: Metadata Context

___description.description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the asset is of interest.
___description.title: Description

___describedBy.description: URL to the data dictionary for the dataset or API. Note that documentation other than a data dictionary can be referenced using Related Documents as shown in the expanded fields.
___describedBy.title: Data Dictionary

___describedByType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the distribution’s describedBy URL
___describedByType.title: Data Dictionary Type

___identifier.description: A unique identifier for the dataset or API as maintained within an Agency catalog or database.
___identifier.title: Unique Identifier

___conformsTo.description: URI used to identify a standardized specification the dataset conforms to
___conformsTo.title: Data Standard

___modified.description: Most recent date on which the dataset was changed, updated or modified.
___modified.title: Last Update

___landingPage.description: Alternative landing page used to redirect user to a contextual, Agency-hosted “homepage” for the Dataset or API when selecting this resource from the Data.gov user interface.
___landingPage.title: Homepage URL

___accessLevel.description: The degree to which this dataset could be made publicly-available, regardless of whether it has been made available. Choices: public (Data asset is or could be made publicly available to all without restrictions), restricted public (Data asset is available under certain use restrictions), or non-public (Data asset is not available to members of the public)
___accessLevel.title: Public Access Level

___keyword.description: Tags (or keywords) help users discover your dataset; please include terms that would be used by technical and non-technical users.
___keyword.title: Tags

$eref.description: A Dataset ContactPoint as a vCard object
$eref.title: Project Open Data ContactPoint vCard

___fn.description: A full formatted name, eg Firstname Lastname
___fn.title: Contact Name

___@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be vcard:Contact for contactPoint
___@type.title: Metadata Context

___temporal.description: The range of temporal applicability of a dataset (i.e., a start and end date of applicability for the data).
___temporal.title: Temporal

___distribution.description: A container for the array of Distribution objects

$eref.description: Validates an entire collection of common core metadata JSON objects. Agencies produce said collections in the form of Data.json files.
$eref.title: Project Open Data Distribution

___downloadURL.description: URL providing direct access to a downloadable file of a dataset
___downloadURL.title: Download URL

___format.description: A human-readable description of the file format of a distribution
___format.title: Format

___@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Distribution for each Distribution
___@type.title: Metadata Context

___describedBy.description: URL to the data dictionary for the distribution found at the downloadURL
___describedBy.title: Data Dictionary

___accessURL.description: URL providing indirect access to a dataset
___accessURL.title: Access URL

___describedByType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the distribution’s describedBy URL
___describedByType.title: Data Dictionary Type

___conformsTo.description: URL providing indirect access to a dataset
___conformsTo.title: Data Standard

___mediaType.description: The machine-readable file format (IANA Media Type or MIME Type) of the distribution’s downloadURL
___mediaType.title: Media Type

___distribution.title: Distribution

___spatial.description: The range of spatial applicability of a dataset. Could include a spatial region like a bounding box or a named place.
___spatial.title: Spatial

___isPartOf.description: The collection of which the dataset is a subset
___isPartOf.title: Collection

___references.description: Related documents such as technical information about a dataset, developer documentation, etc.
___references.title: Related Documents

___rights.description: This may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies. This should also provide an explanation for the selected "accessLevel" including instructions for how to access a restricted file, if applicable, or explanation for why a "non-public" or "restricted public" data assetis not "public," if applicable. Text, 255 characters.
___rights.title: Rights

___dataQuality.description: Whether the dataset meets the agency’s Information Quality Guidelines (true/false).
___dataQuality.title: Data Quality

___primaryITInvestmentUII.description: For linking a dataset with an IT Unique Investment Identifier (UII)
___primaryITInvestmentUII.title: Primary IT Investment UII

___systemOfRecords.description: If the systems is designated as a system of records under the Privacy Act of 1974, provide the URL to the System of Records Notice related to this dataset.
___systemOfRecords.title: System of Records

___programCode.description: Federal agencies, list the primary program related to this data asset, from the Federal Program Inventory. Use the format of 015:001
___programCode.title: Program Code
